meanings: [명사] division, partition, [동사] be divided (into), be partitioned (into)
feel[experience] (firsthand) the reality of national division (of North and South)

vlive.korean: 전부 다 분단돼있어요. It's all defined. 듣기 View video YGK+ : 오늘의 주우재는?
1분단이 커요. 1분단에서 정할게요. First column was the loudest. I will pick someone from here. 듣기 View video Red Velvet : The Perfect Red Velvet Night(더 퍼펙트 레드벨벳 나이트) - PART.2

examples.korean: A total of 133,353 South Koreans seeking a cross-border reunion have registered with the Ministry of Unification and the (South) Korean Red Cross since 1988. The government created a database that year to systematically manage the divided families. 발음듣기 1988년부터 통일부와 대한적십자사에 등록한 남북 이산가족 상봉을 희망하는 남측 인원은 모두 133,353명이다. 정부는 1988년 분단된 가족들을 체계적으로 관리하기 위한 데이터베이스 '이산가족정보통합시스템'을 만들었다. The Korea Times
examples.english: A total of 133,353 South Koreans seeking a cross-border reunion have registered with the Ministry of Unification and the (South) Korean Red Cross since 1988. The government created a database that year to systematically manage the divided families. 발음

examples.korean: The peninsula has been divided ever since. 발음듣기 그 이후로 한반도는 아직까지 분단되어 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: The peninsula has been divided ever since. 발음

examples.korean: South and North Korea need to be unified, as there is no reason for the division to exist any longer. 발음듣기 남북한은 더 이상 분단 상태로 있을 이유가 없기 때문에 통일해야 한다. Neungyule
examples.english: South and North Korea need to be unified, as there is no reason for the division to exist any longer. 발음

examples.korean: The upcoming film 'The Typhoon (Taepung)' is also about the divided Koreas. 발음듣기 곧 개봉될 영화 '태풍'도 또한 분단된 한국에 관한 것이다. Neungyule
examples.english: The upcoming film 'The Typhoon (Taepung)' is also about the divided Koreas. 발음

examples.korean: Ships to and from Mt. Geumgang are being operated for the first time since the division of the country 50 years ago. 발음듣기 분단 50년 만에 금강산을 오가는 뱃길이 열리게 되었다 Neungyule
examples.english: Ships to and from Mt. Geumgang are being operated for the first time since the division of the country 50 years ago. 발음
